TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerGlyphProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義圖像 (Glyph) 提供者類別用來產生圖像陣列的方法，讓這些圖像顯示在活動設計工具上。

span.span: Defines the method that glyph provider classes use to generate an array of glyphs to display on an activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 這個執行個體可定義方法，讓實作類別用於提供一組適合的 物件給活動設計工具。This interface defines the method that implementing classes must use to provide an appropriate set of objects to activity designers. 實作類別還應該在 物件上呈現 物件。The implementing class should also render the objects onto the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作 介面。The following code example demonstrates how you can implement the interface. 它顯示如何實作 方法，在活動設計工具介面上繪製自訂圖像物件。It shows how you can implement the method to draw custom glyph objects on an activity designer surface. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#130)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#130)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection GetGlyphs(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner activityDesigner) cil managed

param.name: activityDesigner
param.span: 要為其擷取圖像的 物件。

span.span: The object for which to retrieve the glyphs.

summary.span: 傳回與指定之活動設計工具關聯的圖像陣列。

span.span: Returns an array of glyphs that are associated with the specified activity designer.

returns.span: 要呈現給活動設計工具的 物件陣列。

span.span: An array of objects to render to the activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作 方法，在活動設計工具介面上繪製自訂圖像物件。The following code example demonstrates how you can implement the method to draw custom glyph objects on an activity designer surface. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#130)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#130)]
